field.name: summary
field.value: Also extract params in form for PaginationHelper.CreatePageLinkWithCurrentQueryString

field.name: description
field.value: I always create form for user to query data, when too many records return, I need paginate those data, PaginationHelper.CreatePageLinkWithCurrentQueryString can help me to build the pagination link but the first rendered page. So I add these codes to extract params from form to build the pagination link when I render the page for the first time.
